import React, { useState } from "react"; const ItemContainer = ({itemsList}) => { // When we work on the item container in detail, we will retreive a list of items // we will build the items in the container with the information in the list of items const [pageIncrement, setPageIncrement] = React.useState(0); // If we don't run this null check, we will run this before we have retrieved the array // back causing an error if (itemsList[0] != null){ console.log(itemsList[0].itemTitle) } return (
